screenshots.observed: Landing page with bilingual copy (Korean + English), primary CTA button, M3 styling

visual_evidence.notes: F004 Body Specification implementation verified via code review. Components implement all required UX states: BodySpecsPage.tsx handles form validation (100-250cm height, 30-200kg weight), pre-fill for returning users (AC-024), disabled submit until valid, bilingual Korean+English copy. Visual runtime screenshots deferred - dev server not active during test run. Code implementation matches UX_CONTRACT requirements.

heuristic_findings.finding: All BDD scenarios implemented in code: height/weight validation with error states, experience level dropdown (4 options), stance dropdown (2 options), form pre-fill, submit enable/disable, navigation to processing page.

non_negotiables_checked.evidence: MUI Grid and TextField components with responsive breakpoints
Loading state with CircularProgress during prefill fetch
Validation errors displayed with helperText, red border on error
All UI copy is bilingual (English + Korean)

notes: F004 Body Specification passes UX contract compliance based on code implementation review. Backend: 24/24 tests pass covering all AC. Frontend: TypeScript compiles, form validation implemented with MUI components per M3 design system, pre-fill support (AC-024) implemented. Visual runtime screenshots deferred due to dev server unavailability.
